author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: رِفِينَ لا أُرِيدُ الحَيوةَ إِلاَّ لإِظْهارِ أَمْرِكَ وَمَا أَرَدْتُ البَقَآءَ إِلا
translation: I swear by Thy glory, O Thou the Best Beloved of the worlds and the Desire of all such as have recognized Thee! The one reason I wish to live is that I may reveal Thy Cause, and I seek the continuance of life only that I may be touched by adversity in Thy path.
